category.name: Tutorial to or from json
category.brief: With pre::json you can serialize or deserialize any C++ Type to JSON, even composite and aggregate types.

category.name: Serialize anything
category.ref: Tutorial to or from json::Serialize anything#Tutorial to or from json::Serialize anything
category.brief: You can serialize anything to json.

category.name: Deserialize anything
category.ref: Tutorial to or from json::Deserialize anything#Tutorial to or from json::Deserialize anything
category.brief: You can deserialize to any type from json.
